statements: SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE species = 'Tiger';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE population_count > 1000;
SELECT species, population_count FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulationData ORDER BY last_observed DESC;
SELECT id, species, location FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE last_observed > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, species, population_count, location, last_observed FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE population_count > 100 ORDER BY last_observed DESC
SELECT species, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM WildlifePopulationData GROUP BY species ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT species, AVG(population_count) AS avg_population FROM WildlifePopulationData GROUP BY species HAVING AVG(population_count) > 50 ORDER BY avg_population DESC
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE location IN ('Forest', 'Savanna') AND population_count BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY location, population_count

SELECT id, species, population_count, location, last_observed FROM WildlifePopulationData WHERE last_observed >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND last_observed <= '2022-12-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY last_observed ASC
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest';
SELECT * FROM habitat_preservation_data WHERE protected_area = true;
SELECT habitat_name, location FROM habitat_preservation_data ORDER BY habitat_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, population_size, habitat_type FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population_data JOIN habitat_preservation_data ON wildlife_population_data.habitat_type = habitat_preservation_data.habitat_name;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE population_size > 100 ORDER BY species_name ASC
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest'
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population_data WHERE habitat_type = 'Grassland' AND population_size < 500
SELECT habitat_name, location, protected_area FROM habitat_preservation_data WHERE protected_area = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT habitat_name FROM habitat_preservation_data ORDER BY habitat_name DESC
SELECT * FROM WildlifePopulations;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_area FROM HabitatStatus ORDER BY habitat_area DESC;
SELECT id, conservation_program, start_date, end_date FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HabitatStatus WHERE endangered_species = TRUE;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM WildlifePopulations ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT conservation_program, start_date, end_date FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_area FROM HabitatStatus WHERE endangered_species = TRUE;
SELECT species_name, population_size, habitat_type FROM WildlifePopulations WHERE habitat_type = 'Forest' ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT conservation_program, start_date, end_date, conservation_program FROM ConservationEfforts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population;
SELECT species, population_count FROM wildlife_population WHERE habitat_id = 3;
SELECT observation_date, species, observation_details FROM observation WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM habitat WHERE area > 100;
SELECT id, description, date_initiated FROM conservation_efforts ORDER BY date_initiated DESC;
SELECT id, species, population_count FROM wildlife_population;
SELECT species, population_count, observation_date FROM wildlife_population WHERE population_count > 10000;
SELECT * FROM wildlife_population WHERE habitat_id = 1 ORDER BY population_count DESC;
SELECT observation_date, species, observation_details FROM observation WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT id, description, date_initiated FROM conservation_efforts WHERE success_rate IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeSpecies;
SELECT species_name, population FROM WildlifeSpecies WHERE habitat='Forest';
SELECT observation_id, observation_date, observer_name FROM Observations ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT habitat_name, habitat_type FROM Habitats WHERE habitat_type='Terrestrial' ORDER BY habitat_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_count, observation_date FROM WildlifePopulation WHERE population_count > 1000 ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM WildlifeSpecies ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT observation_id, species_id, observation_date FROM Observations WHERE location = 'Forest';
SELECT habitat_id, habitat_name, habitat_type FROM Habitats WHERE habitat_type = 'Jungle';
SELECT species_name, population FROM WildlifeSpecies WHERE population > 1000 AND habitat = 'Savannah' ORDER BY population DESC;

SELECT ConservationEfforts.conversation_id, Habitats.habitat_name, ConservationEfforts.start_date, ConservationEfforts.end_date FROM ConservationEfforts JOIN Habitats ON ConservationEfforts.habitat_id = Habitats.habitat_id;
